analysis.key_quote: We must protect civil servants in education (and other agencies like Dept of Justice, HHS) and insulate them from political appointments so they will be able to faithfully serve American people and communities without political interference.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed changes to Schedule F by emphasizing the need to protect civil servants from political interference and highlighting the importance of their expertise and role in serving the public, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the merit-based system.
